sourcesContent:
let projects = [
    {   
        'name': 'The Gray Wolf',
        'category': 'visual-design',
        'tools': ['illustrator', 'photoshop'],
        'subcategory': ['Infographic', 'Illustration'],
        'logotype':'../../assets/visual/The-Gray-Wolf/The-Gray-Wolf-logotype.svg',
        'cover': '../../assets/visual/The-Gray-Wolf/The-Gray-Wolf-cover.png',
        'id': '/visual-design/the-gray-wolf',
        'textColor': '#444444',
        'mainColor': '#444444',
        'accentColor': '#906f57',
        'backgroundColor': '#f7f7f7',
        'content': [
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'Background',
                'text': 'This visual was created for an assignment in a course in the UNC School of Media and Journalism, titled Infographics. The prompt for this project was to create an infographic with strong illustrations or visuals. I completed all of the background research on gray wolves, and I created this infographic from scratch. All of the illustrations were hand (digitally) painted in Adobe Photoshop. The other data visualizations were constructed in Adobe Illustrator. ',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Infographic',
                'subheader': 'User cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/The-Gray-Wolf/The-Gray-Wolf.png',
                'width': '100%'
            }
        ]
    },
    {   
        'name': 'Olivia Rodrigo',
        'category': 'visual-design',
        'tools': ['illustrator', 'photoshop'],
        'subcategory': ['Infographic', 'Illustration'],
        'logotype':'../../assets/visual/OR/OR-logotype.png',
        'cover': '../../assets/visual/OR/OR-cover.png',
        'id': '/visual-design/olivia-rodrigo',
        'textColor': '#444444',
        'mainColor': '#444444',
        'accentColor': '#906f57',
        'backgroundColor': '#f7f7f7',
        'content': [
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'Background',
                'text': 'This visual was created for an assignment in a course in the UNC School of Media and Journalism, titled Infographics. The prompt for this project was to create an infographic with strong illustrations or visuals. I completed all of the background research on gray wolves, and I created this infographic from scratch. All of the illustrations were hand (digitally) painted in Adobe Photoshop. The other data visualizations were constructed in Adobe Illustrator. ',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Infographic',
                'subheader': 'User cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/The-Gray-Wolf/The-Gray-Wolf.png',
                'width': '100%'
            }
        ]
    }
]



export default projects;
